title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: Description: The default value set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: The default value that was set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
EB: The list box of the report parameter should retain the default value even after it has been modified.
SR:
Steps to reproduce: 
1. Set a default value for a list box in a report parameter. 
2. Modify the default value in the list box. 
3. Observe that the modified default value is not retained and the original default value is lost.
